channel.title: Hacking on For the curious ones
channel.description: Recent content in Hacking on For the curious ones

item.title: The Silent Shell
item.description: We live in a world where everything is connected through the internet. Something that is considered as a blessing and a curse at the same time. Almost everyone from developers to students uses the internet every day, but they are not the only ones using the internet, some people use the internet for personal or financial gain, people who work while the world sleeps, people who are constantly looking for security issues for exploitation, the “Hackers”.
